lead_paragraph: Borussia Moenchengladbach's Thorgan Hazard scored twice in a 5-0 demolition of Hertha Berlin in the Bundesliga on Sunday, boosting their chances of qualifying for next season's Champions League.

headline.print_headline: Gladbach Demolish Hertha 5-0 With Hazard Double
headline.main: Gladbach Demolish Hertha 5-0 With Hazard Double
